description.value:
Trigger A creature attempts to open the door without using the key

Effect The trap makes a loud buzz and deals @Damage[5d10[electricity]] damage and @Damage[5d10[sonic]] damage to the triggering creature (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save; this save applies to both the electricity damage and the sonic damage). Further, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32] save.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] for 1 round.

Failure The target is paralyzed for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32] save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

Critical Failure The target is paralyzed for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Fortitude save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success.

details.description: An invisible rune on the door begins emitting a very loud buzzing sound, potentially paralyzing an intruder.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34|name:Disrupt the Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disrupt the rune without triggering it or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (6th level; counteract DC 31) to magically counteract the rune
